#summary Release timeline for KaNDAS, KaNDASd, and KaNDASconsole 0.1.
#labels Category-Project

It is possible that more betas are released if necessary. Minor stable revisions will be added as necessary.

== Past pre-releases ==
  * _April 18, 2008_: Tag and release KaNDAS components version 0.1 Beta 1
    * KaNDAS, KaNDASd, and KaNDASconsole are branched. This branch is frozen for feature commits. In the tag, only urgent fixes may be commited.
    * Version 0.1 Beta 1 becomes available for general consumption.

== Upcoming pre-releases ==
  * _April 25, 2008_: Tag and release KaNDAS components version 0.1 Beta 2
    * In the tag, only urgent fixes may be commited.
    * Version 0.1 Beta 2 becomes available for general consumption.

== Upcoming stable releases ==
  * _May 2, 2008_: Tag and release KaNDAS components version 0.1
    * In the tag, only urgent fixes may be commited.
